page.title: 11Rogart - Trade (Bookshop)
page.content: There has been a Christian bookshop in Rogart for five years. It sells stationery, cards, Tearcraft goods, Bibles and many Christian books. The shop is open from 14.00 to 17.00 hours every Tuesday and Friday. When she's asked, Mrs Woods, the manageress, will provide a bookstall. She's often asked to do this by churches in the area. The Christian bookshop is in Rogart, because there isn't another one in the county of Sutherland and Rogart is quite central for anywhere in Sutherland. The best-selling book is the Bible.
